message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a framework for text detection using deep CNNs, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves learning a guidance mask from the input image, which is a form of attention mechanism and falls under machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses training strategies and performance evaluation, which are common topics in information retrieval (cs.IR) and computational linguistics (cs.CL).
